La Nyalla : Sosok Kapolri Baru Bagus, Semua Pilihan Jokowi Baik
02 Nov 2019, 14:41 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw


La Nyalla : Sosok Kapolri Baru Bagus, Semua Pilihan Jokowi Baik

KBRN, Jakarta : Ketua Dewan Pertimbangan Daerah (DPD) RI La Nyalla Mattalitti sempat mengomentari terpilihnya Jenderal Polisi Idham Azis sebagai Kepala Kepolisian Negara Republik Indonesia (Kapolri) baru menggantikan Jenderal Polisi Tito Karnavian yang pensiun dan sudah duduk sebagai Menteri Dalam Negeri (Mendagri) Kabinet Indonesia Maju periode 2019-2024."Bagus (Idham Azis). Pokoknya yang sudah dipilih Presiden Jokowi itu sudah bagus. Mari dukung saja," sebut La Nyalla kepada wartawan saat ditemui dalam Pers Gathering yang mengangkat tema 'Sinergitas DPD RI dan Insan Pers Guna Penguatan Peran DPD RI Dalam Memperjuangkan Aspirasi Daerah' di Surabaya, Jumat (1/11/2019) malam. Pernyataan La Nyalla itu bukan tanpa alasan. Karena dirinya berpendapat, harapan seluruh rakyat Indonesia pastinya kinerja polisi bisa tambah bagus. Dan dalam konteks progres sebuah lembaga, sejatinya memang semakin bagus."Harapan semoga kinerja polisi tambah bagus. Semakin lama 'kan semakin bagus," ujarnya singkat.Ketika ditanyakan apakah pimpinan DPD RI akan menggelar pertemuan resmi dengan Kapolri Jenderal Polisi Idham Azis, La Nyalla memberi sinyal positif."Ya kami (DPD dan Kapolri) pasti ketemu," pungkasnya.Seperti diberitakan RRI sebelumnya, Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) resmi melantik Jenderal Polisi Idham Azis sebagai Kepala Kepolisian Negara Republik Indonesia (Kapolri) di Istana Negara Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).Dalam pelantikan tersebut, Presiden Jokowi menyematkan kenaikan pangkat Idham Azis dari Komisaris Jenderal Polisi menjadi Jenderal Polisi alias bintang empat penuh.Tongkat komando kepemimpinan Polri juga sudah diserahkan Kepala Negara kepada Idham sebagai tanda dirinya siap bertugas hari ini juga.Kapolri Jenderal Polisi Idham Azis menggantikan pendahulunya, Jenderal Polisi Tito Karnavian, yang saat ini sudah mengemban tugas baru sebagai Menteri Dalam Negeri (Mendagri) dalam Kabinet Indonesia Maju periode 2019-2024.Sehari sebelum pelantikan, Ketua DPR RI Puan Maharani menyatakan Kepala Kepolisian Negara Republik Indonesia (Kapolri) baru akan langsung disambut sejumlah tantangan, diantaranya, pengamanan Pilkada Serentak 2020, pencegahan radikalisme, penegakan hukum dan pencegahan aksi terorisme dengan mengedepankan deteksi dini intelijen, serta kejahatan cyber dan kejahatan transnasional.  "Tugas berat menghadang Kapolri baru. Tapi melihat rekam jejaknya dan paparan program saat  fit and proper test, kami optimis Kapolri baru akan bisa mengatasi tantangan-tantangan itu,” ujar Puan, di Paripurna DPR, Kompleks Parlemen Senayan, Jakarta, Kamis (31/10/2019).Secara khusus, Puan berharap nakhoda baru Polri bisa memberi perhatian khusus pada kejahatan narkoba yang makin masif dan menyasar generasi muda. Kepada Kapolri baru, Puan berpesan  segera melakukan konsolidasi internal setelah dilantik oleh Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi). “Konsolidasi internal penting untuk menyatukan gerak langkah sebagai jiwa korsa menghadapi tantangan yang makin kompleks,” imbuhnya.Setelah konsolidasi internal, Puan menyarankan Kapolri baru berkoordinasi dengan penegak hukum lain. “Agar tidak terjadi miskomunikasi yang membuat rakyat bingung," tegas Puan. Selain itu, ”Ketua DPR Puan maharani mengharap Polri terus meningkatkan kemampuan profesional sesuai perkembangan zaman. "Dan tentu saja harus terus dekat dengan warga sebagai pengayom masyarakat,” tandasnya.Sebelumnya, Ketua DPR RI memimpin sidang paripurna untuk mendengarkan pemaparan hasi fit and proper test Komisi III DPR RI terhadap calon Kapolri baru, Komisaris Jenderal Polisi (Komjen Pol) Idham Azis. Dari 575 anggota DPR RI, hadir 361 orang dan semua secara aklamasi menyetujui Komjen Pol Idham Azis sebagai Kapolri baru menggantikan Jenderal Polisi Tito Karnavian."Setuju," jawab seluruh peserta atas disetujuinya Komjen Pol Idham Azis sebagai Kapolri.Pelantikan Komjen Pol Idham Azis akan dilakukan Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) pada Jumat, 1 November 2019 dengan kenaikan pangkat menjadi Jenderal Polisi Idham Azis. (Sumber : Jorike Fitri/RRI-PRO3)

La Nyalla: New Police Chief Good, All Jokowi Good Choice
02 Nov 2019, 14:41 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw


La Nyalla: New Police Chief Good, All Jokowi Good Choice

KBRN, Jakarta: Chairman of the Indonesian Regional Advisory Council (DPD) La Nyalla Mattalitti commented on the election of Police General Idham Azis as the new National Police Chief of the Republic of Indonesia (Kapolri) replacing Police General Tito Karnavian who retired and had sat as Minister of the Interior (Mendagri) Cabinet Indonesia Forward 2019-2024 period. "Good (Idham Azis). The point that has been chosen by President Jokowi is already good. Let's just support it," La Nyalla said to reporters when he was met in the Press Gathering with the theme 'Synergy of the DPD RI and the Persons of the Press to Use Strengthening the Role of the DPD RI in Fighting for Regional Aspirations' in Surabaya, Friday (11/01/2019) night. La Nyalla's statement was not without reason. Because he believes, the hope of all Indonesian people is certainly the performance of the police can be better. And in the context of an institution's progress, the truth is indeed getting better. "Hopefully the performance of the police will be better. The longer the better," he said briefly. When asked whether the leadership of the DPD RI will hold an official meeting with National Police Chief Idham Azis, La Nyalla gave a positive signal. "Yes we (DPD and Kapolri) will definitely meet," he concluded. As reported by RRI earlier, President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) officially inaugurated Police General Idham Azis as Chief of the Indonesian National Police (Kapolri) at the Jakarta State Palace on Friday (1/11/2019). In the inauguration, President Jokowi pinned the promotion of Idham Azis from Commissioner General of Police to Police General aka full four-star. The leadership commander of the National Police had also been handed over by the Head of State to Idham as a sign that he was ready to serve today too . National Police Chief Police General Idham Azis replaces his predecessor, Police General Tito Karnavian, who has now new mban assignment as Minister of Home Affairs (Mendagri) in the Advanced Indonesian Cabinet for the period 2019-2024. A day before the inauguration, Speaker of the Indonesian Parliament Puan Maharani stated that the Head of the Indonesian National Police (Kapolri) would immediately be greeted with a number of challenges, including, securing the Simultaneous Election of 2020 , prevention of radicalism, law enforcement and prevention of acts of terrorism by promoting early detection of intelligence, as well as cyber and transnational crime. "The daunting task facing the new National Police Chief. But looking at his track record and program exposure during the fit and proper test, we are optimistic that the new National Police Chief will be able to overcome these challenges," Puan said, at the DPR Plenary, Parliament Complex Senayan, Jakarta, Thursday (31 / 10/2019) Specifically, Puan hopes that the new police captain can pay special attention to drug crimes that are increasingly massive and targeting the younger generation, to the new National Police Chief, Puan ordered immediate internal consolidation after being sworn in by President Joko Widodo (Jokowi). internally it is important to unite the steps of the korsa soul to face increasingly complex challenges, "he added. After internal consolidation, Puan suggested that the new police chief coordinate with other law enforcers." In order to avoid miscommunication that makes people confused, "said Puan. In addition, "DPR Speaker Puan Maharani hopes that the National Police will continue to improve their professional abilities in accordance with the times. "And of course it must continue to be close to citizens as community guards," he said. Previously, the Chairperson of the Indonesian House of Representatives chaired a plenary session to hear the presentation of the results of the House of Representatives Commission III fit and proper test on new National Police candidates, Commissioner General of Police (Komjen Pol) Idham Azis Of the 575 members of the Indonesian House of Representatives, 361 were present and all unanimously approved National Police Commissioner Idham Azis as the new National Police Chief replacing Police General Tito Karnavian. "Agree," answered all participants upon the approval of National Police Commissioner Idham Azis as National Police Chief. carried out by President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) on Friday, November 1, 2019 with the promotion to become Police General Idham Azis. (Source: Jorike Fitri / RRI-PRO3)
